org.treetank.service.xml.shredder
Class XMLUpdateShredder

java.lang.Object
  org.treetank.service.xml.shredder.XMLShredder
      org.treetank.service.xml.shredder.XMLUpdateShredder
All Implemented Interfaces:
Callable<Void>
public final class XMLUpdateShredder
extends XMLShredder
implements Callable<Void>

XMLUpdateShredder

Shredder, which updates a Treetank revision to the next revision, as thus it just inserts or deletes nodes, which have been changed. Renames are treated as insert new node, delete old node.

Author:
Johannes Lichtenberger, University of Konstanz

Constructor Detail

XMLUpdateShredder

public XMLUpdateShredder(INodeWriteTrx paramWtx,
                         XMLEventReader paramReader,
                         EShredderInsert paramAddAsFirstChild,
                         Object paramData,
                         EShredderCommit paramCommit)
                  throws TTUsageException,
                         TTIOException
Normal constructor to invoke a shredding process on a existing IWriteTransaction.

Parameters:
paramWtx - IWriteTransaction where the new XML Fragment should be placed
paramReader - XMLEventReader (StAX parser) of the XML Fragment
paramAddAsFirstChild - if the insert is occuring on a node in an existing tree. false is not possible when wtx is on root node
paramData - the data the update shredder operates on. Either a List of XMLEvents or a File
paramCommit - determines if changes should be commited
Throws:
TTUsageException - if insertasfirstChild && updateOnly is both true OR if wtx is not pointing to doc-root and updateOnly= true
TTIOException - if Treetank cannot access node keys
